text: Gerard Lawson (born January 12, 1985) is an American football player. He is cornerback and kickoff returner. Lawson is currently a free agent. He was signed by the Cleveland Browns in 2008. He played college football at Oregon State. Lawson has also played for the Hartford Colonials and Philadelphia Eagles. title: Gerard Lawson
